item.title: How to Edit the Microsoft Whiteboard App Display (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Pan Across the Canvas: With Click With Keyboard How to Change the Whiteboard Color How to Change the Whiteboard Background How to Enhance Inked Shapes No time to scroll down? Click through this tutorial presentation: Follow along with a video tutorial: How to Pan Across the Canvas With Mouse Step 1: First open a whiteboard template. Click, hold, and drag the mouse in any direction to pan across the canvas.
